content: As all this had went on, the Ammo Knights managed to successfully fire a new air bubble over the Noah and radio Luffy of this. Hody charges at him while Luffy tells Shirahoshi to stay by his side. Luffy stretches back his arm, going Gear 2 and coats it with Armament Haki. Just as Hody closes in, Luffy hits him with a new technique: Gomu Gomu no Red Hawk, slamming it into Hody's stomach which not only greatly wounds Hody but somehow causes an explosion from Hody's back.
